aboutText: I'm Computers Engineer with Master Degree in Automation & Frontend engineer with 2 years of experience and have solid knowledge in Backend, SEO, and responsive development. Engineered and launched single-page applications (SPAs) using Vue js and Nuxt js with Vuetify frameworks.

items.question: Can you build a Single Page Application (SPA) for me?
items.answer: Yes, absolutely. There's nothing better than an SPA to make your website fast and modern — and I can build it for you.

items.question: What will make my website special if you create it?
items.answer: Every designer and developer has a unique perspective. Anyone can pick colors and animations, but choosing how and which elements to combine — that’s what makes a website truly special.

items.question: Will it be responsive?
items.answer: Of course! Your website will look beautiful on any device and at every screen width.

items.question: I need to ensure my website’s performance is solid.
items.answer: That’s your right — and I’ve got you covered. I’ll make sure your website performs well, and I’ll stay with you until you're fully satisfied.

items.question: I want my website to be SEO-friendly!
items.answer: I use the Nuxt.js framework, which is SEO-friendly by design. You can be confident your site will rank well when users search on Google or other engines.

items.question: What types of websites can you create?
items.answer: Portfolios, e-commerce stores, company websites — especially those that want to showcase their services and products.

items.question: What’s the price for each page?
items.answer: It depends on the type of project. Some pages are simple and inexpensive. We can talk about your project’s size and features, and then agree on pricing. I’ll make sure you’re happy and fully satisfied.
